name: SLiM Search Technologies
tag_list: social-network, social-search, link, share, browser, add-on, search, bookmarking
overview:
SLiM Search Technologies owns and operates SearchLikeMe.com, a web site where people can easily save, annotate and share their web research individually or collaboratively in groups.

SearchLikeMe(tm) is composed of a browser toolbar, a web site and interactive search functionality. The toolbar provides a fast and simple way to save and group interesting web sites around topics. The toolbar focuses on providing benefit to individual users by allowing them to save links in “SLiM Pages(tm) much more quickly than using a standard bookmarking approach. The actions a user takes in the toolbar then benefit others through the web site and search capability. The SearchLikeMe web site provides a view into active SLiM Page creation and update. The SearchLikeMe search functionality provides an interactive “hot/cold” capability that allows uses to search by tags and indicate, “more/less like this,” with drag and drop screen elements.

In addition to its public web site, SLiM Search Technologies licenses SearchLikeMe to social network operators and to enterprise customers. SearchLikeMe lets social network operators offer a new way for their members to remain engaged on the network and contribute knowledge from other sites into that network. In an enterprise setting, SearchLikeMe is a drop in solution that helps employees easily share how they used their enterprise search tools with other employees to minimize the duplication of effort spent in locating corporate documents.

In all cases, SearchLikeMe is a companion system to existing search and social networking tools.
